item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 23, 20:00 - 21:00 UTC

Aug 18, 14:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2023 20:00 UTC
End time : 23/08/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times. Please do not hesitate to contact us via our support channels with any questions or concerns.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on customers' projects

item.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - Telephony
item.description:
Aug 11, 14:23 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/08/2023 10:00 UTC
End Time : 11/08/2023 11:57 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
A workaround made services back to operational. A complementary operation brought back services to their nominal performances.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 11, 12:26 UTC
Monitoring - CTI and fax are operational again.
Our teams are still performing operations to guarantee service redundancy.

Aug 11, 11:48 UTC
Identified - CTI and fax are still unavailable.

Aug 11, 11:38 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 11/08/2023 10:00 UTC
End Time : 11/08/2023 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Incoming/outgoing calls and conferences were unavailable till 11:10 UTC
Voicemails are available again.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently monitoring the situation

item.title: [GRA/BHS][WebHosting] Services upgrade perturbations in Africa, Americas and APAC
item.description:
Aug 11, 08:43 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 28/07/2023 15:50 UTC
End Time : 10/07/2023 14:22 UTC
Service impact : Web hosting services upgrade or StartSQL option subscriptions were blocked when ordered in customer manager, from Africa, Americas and APAC.
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 8, 15:31 UTC
Update - MANAGER-11980 : Production is ongoing

Aug 8, 14:23 UTC
Update - MANAGER-11978 : Production ended the 07/08/2023
MANAGER-11955 : Production is ongoing

Aug 8, 13:08 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 28, 15:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/07/2023 15:50 UTC
Service impact : Web hosting services upgrade or StartSQL option subscriptions may be blocked when ordered in customer manager, from Africa, Americas and APAC.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.description:
Aug 10, 06:35 UTC

Customers are currently able to access their voicemails without facing any issue.
